metadata.title: Ignacio Kruchowski | Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Welcome to my digital space! I'm Ignacio Kruchowski, a Full Stack Developer with a passion for crafting seamless and innovative web experiences. Specializing in front-end development using the powerful MERN stack, I bring creativity and technical knowledge to every project.

about.description: I am a Software Developer based in Argentina, driven by a passion for crafting effective digital solutions. Eager to grow professionally, I am focused on writing clean code and staying updated on best practices. Actively seeking opportunities to collaborate within dynamic teams, I am enthusiastic about contributing my skills to projects that push the boundaries of web development.

tilded.description: A modern productivity ecosystem featuring Kanban boards, multi-language support (10+ languages), and personalized workflows built with React 19 and Fastify.
tilded.cardDescription: Productivity & Kanban ecosystem with multi-language support.

nexmon.description: Ultra-lightweight, high-performance system monitor built with Rust and Tauri. It provides real-time visualization of system resources (CPU, RAM, Processes) with near-zero overhead and a modern interface powered by React.
nexmon.cardDescription: High-performance system monitor built with Rust and Tauri.

void.description: A minimalist fashion e-commerce platform for a men's oversized clothing brand, featuring AI-powered chat assistance, fluid animations with Framer Motion, and a curated product catalog focused on structural minimalism.
void.cardDescription: Minimalist fashion e-commerce with AI-powered assistance.

focusly.description: A minimalist Pomodoro timer designed for deep work. It features preset focus modes, smooth GSAP animations, and a distraction-free interface built with Electron.
focusly.cardDescription: Minimalist Pomodoro app designed for deep work flow.

nova.description: Real-time financial dashboard for market exploration, integrating WebSockets and Binance API with a high-performance Bun and Redis backend.
nova.cardDescription: Explore financial markets with real-time data streaming.

devflights.description: Interactive BI analytics platform for airline operations, utilizing a PostgreSQL Star Schema and Python for advanced data visualization.
devflights.cardDescription: Business Intelligence and Data Analytics for airline fleets.

vox-chat.description: Feature-rich secure chat application with real-time messaging via Socket.io, room customization, and a seamless mobile-first experience.
vox-chat.cardDescription: Secure real-time chat with custom private rooms.

market-swift.description: High-performance landing page for marketing automation, focused on optimized UX/UI and clear conversion paths for digital strategies.

olymfit.description: Evolutionary e-commerce platform tailored for fitness enthusiasts, offering a dynamic and immersive experience in the world of health and wellness.
olymfit.cardDescription: Fitness e-commerce platform with advanced features.

todo-app.description: A to-do app for seamless task organization. Create, manage, and organize your tasks effortlessly with this user-friendly platform.
todo-app.cardDescription: Organize tasks efficiently with this intuitive app.
